oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jearoldstown, Greene County, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: M.H. Gass & Co., Traveling Photographers. 'Views and Groups a Specialty.'
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jearoldstown, Greene County, TN. Handwritten ID on back of photograph indicates picture was taken before 1900. ID suggests this photograph may have been an election scene and mentions the flag carried at right. Also spelled Jeroldstown. IDs on front of photograph mention: home in background, Jim Moore, Will Bright home, Goble(?) store, Will Bright, Jim Simmons store, and Allen Mill. Shows men on horseback on unpaved street, buildings at right and in the background. Man in foreground on horseback holding flag and U.S. flag mounted on house in background. M.H. Gass & Co., Traveling Photographers. 'Views and Groups a Specialty.'
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Events; Horses; Flags;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
